saying: Be yourself, everyone else is already taken.
description: Kidd is a goat villager from the Animal Crossing series that first appeared in Doubutsu no Mori e+, as a lazy islander. He later reappeared in Animal Crossing: New Leaf, where he is a smug villager, and in Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp to launch the Civic Theme, alongside Gaston and Elise. His name comes from "kid," the name for a young goat.
